articles.title: Trump welcomes Zelenskyy to White House for talks on ending Russia's war in Ukraine
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy met with U.S. President Donald Trump at the White House to discuss ending the war in Ukraine. European leaders also attended the meeting, aiming to bolster Ukraine's negotiating position. Trump stated that Russia wants peace and that he is arranging a meeting between Putin and Zelenskyy.

articles.title: Top News Headlines of August 18, 2025
articles.description: Key headlines include astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla meeting PM Modi, ongoing protests in Parliament regarding Bihar electoral rolls, and Hamas approving a Gaza ceasefire proposal. The article also notes that Zelenskyy's attire for his meeting with Trump was pre-approved.

articles.title: Top news of the day: INDIA bloc considering impeachment motion against CEC Gyanesh Kumar; after Putin, Trump set to meet Zelenskyy, and more
articles.description: The INDIA bloc is considering an impeachment motion against Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar. In international news, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and European leaders will meet U.S. President Donald Trump to discuss a peace deal for Ukraine. The Rajya Sabha passed The Indian Ports Bill, 2025.
